en.help_tooltip:
Your medicine cats will gather herbs over each timeskip and during any patrols you send them on. You can see what was gathered in the Log below! Your medicine cats will give these to any hurt or sick cats that need them, helping those cats to heal quicker.

Hover your mouse over the medicine den image to see what herbs your Clan has!

meds_cover.zero: You have no medicine cats who are able to work. Your Clan will be at a higher risk of death and disease.
meds_cover.one: Your medicine cat can care for a Clan of up to %{clansize} members, including {PRONOUN/med_cat/self}.
meds_cover.many: Your medicine cats can care for a Clan of up to %{clansize} members, including themselves.

herb_amount_zero.one: The herb stores are empty and bare, this does not bode well.
herb_amount_zero.many: The herb stores are empty and bare, this does not bode well.

herb_amount_very_low.one: The medicine cat worries over the herb stores, {PRONOUN/med_name/subject} {VERB/med_name/doesn't/don't} have nearly enough for the Clan.
herb_amount_very_low.many: The medicine cats worry over the herb stores, they don't have nearly enough for the Clan.

herb_amount_low.one: The herb stores are small, but it's enough for now.
herb_amount_low.many: The herb stores are small, but it's enough for now.

herb_amount_average.one: The medicine cat is content with how many herbs {PRONOUN/med_cat/subject} {VERB/med_cat/has/have} stocked up.
herb_amount_average.many: The medicine cats are content with how many herbs they have stocked up.

herb_amount_high.one: The herb stores are overflowing and the medicine cat has little worry.
herb_amount_high.many: The herb stores are overflowing and the medicine cats have little worry.

herb_amount_very_high.one: StarClan has blessed them with plentiful herbs and the medicine cat sends {PRONOUN/med_cat/poss} thanks to Silverpelt.
herb_amount_very_high.many: StarClan has blessed them with plentiful herbs and the medicine cats send their thanks to Silverpelt.
